Name: Tim S. Van Haren
AboutMe:
I'm a programming freak: C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL. My love for programming runs deep.

When I was a kid, I wanted nothing more than to be a construction worker because they got to physically build things. I helped my dad on building projects around the house, big and small. As I grew up and PCs became something of a common home appliance, I discovered that I could build anything I wanted using the power of programming. Today I get to do what I enjoy: build things for people. StackOverflow has not only helped me be better at what I love, it's allowed me to help others find that same love in a community that feels like home. #SOreadytohelp
